results.title: Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ appears to be effective as an anti-@DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ agent in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with obstructive @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ when reduction in myocardial @CHEMICAL_Oxygen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010100 @@@oxygen@@@ supply (@DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ not preceded by an increase in heart rate and due presumably to functional @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023921 @@@coronary stenosis@@@) or increase in demand are the likely causes.

citations.NLM: Cruickshank JM, McAinsh J. Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview. Curr Med Res Opin. 1991;12(8):485-96. PMID: 1764953
citations.BibTeX: @article{1764953, title={Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview.}, author={Cruickshank JM and McAinsh J}, journal={Curr Med Res Opin}, volume={12}, number={8}, pages={485-96}}

results.title: Effect of the combination of diltiazem and atenolol on exercise-induced regional myocardial ischemia in conscious dogs.
results.text_hl: The effect of combination therapy with @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on the regional myocardial blood flow-function relationship was studied in eight conscious @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ with chronic @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023921 @@@coronary artery stenosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Matsuzaki M, Guth B, Tajimi T, Kemper WS, Ross J Jr. Effect of the combination of diltiazem and atenolol on exercise-induced regional myocardial ischemia in conscious dogs. Circulation. 1985 Jul;72(1):233-43. PMID: 4006133
citations.BibTeX: @article{4006133, title={Effect of the combination of diltiazem and atenolol on exercise-induced regional myocardial ischemia in conscious dogs.}, author={Matsuzaki M and Guth B and Tajimi T and Kemper WS and Ross J Jr}, journal={Circulation}, volume={72}, number={1}, pages={233-43}}

results.title: [Angina pectoris caused by dynamic coronary obstruction and beta-blockers].
results.text_hl: Particular consideration is given to a paper by Mulcahy et al. which confirms and reinforces the results of other clinical works on the therapeutic effectiveness of the cardioselective beta-blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in these mixed forms of @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ (fixed @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023921 @@@coronary stenosis@@@ plus dynamic @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023921 @@@coronary stenosis@@@).

citations.NLM: Pinelli G, Di Pasquale G. [Angina pectoris caused by dynamic coronary obstruction and beta-blockers]. Minerva Cardioangiol. 1989 May;37(5):229-32. PMID: 2779801
citations.BibTeX: @article{2779801, title={[Angina pectoris caused by dynamic coronary obstruction and beta-blockers].}, author={Pinelli G and Di Pasquale G}, journal={Minerva Cardioangiol}, volume={37}, number={5}, pages={229-32}}
